segments.text: We ’ re going to need a lot of new stuff after the holidays . Let ’ s make a list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , Mr . Richardson . What do you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , to begin with , we ’ re going to have to get a new desk for you and I ’ d like to replace that old typewriter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ! I agree ! We could really use another one ! I ’ ll get on that right away ! What else would you like to order ?
segments.speaker: S2
